=MODELSEL 1/6=
Select/Copy/Move Model memory

----
==Key Presses==
*Up/Down*
    Move up/Down

*Menu*
    Highlight Model memory.  <br>
    Moving up/down will move memory.<br>
    Pressing Exit will remove highlight.

*Menu Long*
    Copy highlighted model to last slot.

*Right*
    Load and Edit Model

*Exit*
    Load Model

*Exit Long*
    Load Model and back to main screen
